Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a satirical article from a website known for publishing fictional stories.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that President Trump planned on signing an executive order to abolish impeachment based on leaked conversations, without providing any evidence or credible sources.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the source of the claim, News Werthy, is a satirical website and not a reliable news source.
Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the seriousness and credibility of the leaked conversations by presenting them as a genuine plan to abolish impeachment, without considering the satirical nature of the source.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement in the claim.
